organization.description:
Dade Family Counseling, Inc. is a community-based non profit agency that provides comprehensive outpatient counseling services. We allow the clients to effectively address emotional, psychological and behavioral issues in a safe and stable environment.

Services Provided:

- Out-Patient Substance Abuse Treatment
- Substance Abuse Evaluations and Treatment, if needed
- Batterer's Intervention (DIP) / Domestic Violence
- Anger Management Program
- Parenting Skills Program
- Individual, couples and Family counseling
organization.name: DADE FAMILY COUNSELING, INC.
